trans-unit.source: Represents an X.509 store, which is a physical store where certificates are persisted and managed.
trans-unit.target: 表示 X.509 存储，该存储是保留和管理证书的物理存储。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to work with an X.509 store.
trans-unit.target: 使用此类可以使用 X.509 存储。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，则此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。

trans-unit.source: For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> class does not implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method.
trans-unit.target: 对于面向的应用[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]及早期版本、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>类未实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口，并因此不具有`Dispose`方法。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个示例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示如何可在每个打开标准 X.509 存储区和列表的证书的数目。

trans-unit.source: The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书的范围。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储。

trans-unit.source: It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains.
trans-unit.target: 它将输出显示是否每个存储存在并且，如果数因此，证书它包含的摘要。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object for each combination of standard name and standard location.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>标准名称和标准位置的每个组合的对象。

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A> method with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 它调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A>方法替换<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，仅当它已存在打开的物理存储。

trans-unit.source: If the physical store exists, the example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A> properties to display the number of certificates in the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在物理存储，该示例使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A>属性，以显示存储区中的证书的数目。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 此示例打开 X.509 证书存储区、 将添加和删除证书，，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using the personal certificates of the current user store.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前用户存储的个人证书来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object using the personal X.509 certificate store for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>对象使用当前用户的个人的 X.509 证书存储。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开 X.509 证书存储区。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: A handle to an <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> store.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> 存储区的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using an Intptr handle to an <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> store.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> 存储区的 Intptr 句柄初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数提供非托管与 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `HCERTSTORE` handle, see the unmanaged CAPI documentation in the Platform SDK section of the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`HCERTSTORE`处理，请参阅的平台 SDK 部分中的非托管的 CAPI 文档[MSDN 库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="storeHandle" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="storeHandle" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="storeHandle" /> parameter points to an invalid context.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="storeHandle" /> 参数指向了无效的上下文。

trans-unit.source: for unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 对于非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the location of the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 指定 X.509 证书存储位置的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> 值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object, specifying the store location, which is either the location for the current user or the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>对象，指定的存储位置，这是当前用户的位置或本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开 X.509 证书存储区。

trans-unit.target: 指定 X.509 证书存储的名称的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> 值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an X.509 store for the current user that corresponds to values enumerated by <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建对应于枚举的值的当前用户 X.509 存储<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开 X.509 证书存储区。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: A string value that represents the store name.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示存储名称的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using the specified store name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的存储区名称初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object using a particular X.509 store name for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>对象使用当前用户的特定 X.509 存储名称。

trans-unit.source: To create a new store, specify a name that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新存储，请指定不存在的名称。

trans-unit.source: A new store will be created with that name.
trans-unit.target: 将具有该名称创建了新的存储区。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the name of the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 指定 X.509 证书存储的名称的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the location of the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 指定 X.509 证书存储位置的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> and <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation" /> 值来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object, specifying both the store name and the store location.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>对象，指定应用商店名称和存储位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="storeLocation" /> is not a valid location or <paramref name="storeName" /> is not a valid name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="storeLocation" /> 不是有效位置或者 <paramref name="storeName" /> 不是有效名称。

trans-unit.source: for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开 X.509 证书存储区。

trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a value from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它表示 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> 枚举的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the location of the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 指定 X.509 证书存储位置的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using a string that represents a value from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> enumeration and a value from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 使用表示 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> 枚举的值和 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation" /> 枚举的值的字符串来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object using a store name and location.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>对象使用的存储名称和位置。

trans-unit.source: To create a new store, specify a name that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新存储，请指定不存在的名称。

trans-unit.source: A new store will be created with that name.
trans-unit.target: 将具有该名称创建了新的存储区。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="storeLocation" /> contains invalid values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="storeLocation" /> 包含无效值。

trans-unit.source: for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开 X.509 证书存储区。

trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: The certificate to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的证书。

trans-unit.source: Adds a certificate to an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 将证书添加到 X.509 证书存储。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add a single certificate to an X.509 store.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法将单个证书添加到 X.509 存储。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The certificate could not be added to the store.
trans-unit.target: 无法将证书添加到存储区。

trans-unit.source: for adding certificates to an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于将证书添加到 X.509 证书存储。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.AddToStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.AddToStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: The collection of certificates to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的证书集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds a collection of certificates to an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 将证书集合添加到 X.509 证书存储。

trans-unit.source: This method adds more than one certificate to an X.509 certificate store; if one certificate addition fails, the operation is reverted and no certificates are added.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将多个证书添加到 X.509 证书存储区;如果一个证书添加失败，此操作将恢复并不添加任何证书。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificates" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: for adding certificates to an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于将证书添加到 X.509 证书存储。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.AddToStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.AddToStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of certificates located in an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 返回位于 X.509 证书存储中的证书集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 证书集合。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a snapshot of the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的 X.509 证书存储区的快照。

trans-unit.source: Note that subsequent <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Remove%2A> operations performed on the store will not have any effect on the collection that is returned.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，后续<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Remove%2A>存储区上执行的操作不会产生任何影响返回的集合。

trans-unit.source: This snapshot is recalculated each time the property is called, so the use of this property inside an iterative function is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 此快照是每次重新计算的属性称为，因此建议不要将此属性在迭代函数内使用。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个示例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示如何可在每个打开标准 X.509 存储区和列表的证书的数目。

trans-unit.source: The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书的范围。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储。

trans-unit.source: It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains.
trans-unit.target: 它将输出显示是否每个存储存在并且，如果数因此，证书它包含的摘要。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object for each combination of standard name and standard location.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>标准名称和标准位置的每个组合的对象。

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A> method with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 它调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A>方法替换<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，仅当它已存在打开的物理存储。

trans-unit.source: If the physical store exists, the example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A> properties to display the number of certificates in the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在物理存储，该示例使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A>属性，以显示存储区中的证书的数目。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 此示例打开 X.509 证书存储区、 将添加和删除证书，，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: for enumerating certificates in an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于枚举中的 X.509 证书的证书存储区。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: Closes an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 关闭 X.509 证书存储。

trans-unit.source: This method releases all resources associated with the store.
trans-unit.target: 此方法释放与应用商店关联的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: You should always close an X.509 certificate store after use.
trans-unit.target: 你应在使用后始终关闭 X.509 证书存储。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> 占用的资源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> class does not implement this interface, and therefore the `Dispose` method does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> 实现<xref:System.IDisposable>开头的接口[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>类未实现此接口，因此`Dispose`方法不存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 获取 X.509 证书存储的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 证书存储区的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the X.509 certificate store location of either the store for the current user or the store for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的 X.509 证书存储位置为当前用户存储或本地计算机存储。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个示例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示如何可在每个打开标准 X.509 存储区和列表的证书的数目。

trans-unit.source: The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书的范围。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储。

trans-unit.source: It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains.
trans-unit.target: 它将输出显示是否每个存储存在并且，如果数因此，证书它包含的摘要。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object for each combination of standard name and standard location.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>标准名称和标准位置的每个组合的对象。

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A> method with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 它调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A>方法替换<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，仅当它已存在打开的物理存储。

trans-unit.source: If the physical store exists, the example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A> properties to display the number of certificates in the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在物理存储，该示例使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A>属性，以显示存储区中的证书的数目。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 此示例打开 X.509 证书存储区、 将添加和删除证书，，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 获取 X.509 证书存储的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 证书存储的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the X.509 certificate store name.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的 X.509 证书存储名称。

trans-unit.source: This value can indicate the type of certificates stored, such as root certificates or certificates from trusted publishers.
trans-unit.target: 此值可以指示证书存储，例如根证书或来自受信任的发行者的证书的类型。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个示例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示如何可在每个打开标准 X.509 存储区和列表的证书的数目。

trans-unit.source: The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例演示如何添加和删除单个证书和证书的范围。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 此示例尝试打开当前计算机上每个标准位置中的每个标准存储。

trans-unit.source: It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains.
trans-unit.target: 它将输出显示是否每个存储存在并且，如果数因此，证书它包含的摘要。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object for each combination of standard name and standard location.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>标准名称和标准位置的每个组合的对象。

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A> method with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 它调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A>方法替换<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，仅当它已存在打开的物理存储。

trans-unit.source: If the physical store exists, the example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A> properties to display the number of certificates in the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在物理存储，该示例使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A>属性，以显示存储区中的证书的数目。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 此示例打开 X.509 证书存储区、 将添加和删除证书，，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that specifies the way to open the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值的按位组合，它指定 X.509 证书存储的打开方式。

trans-unit.source: Opens an X.509 certificate store or creates a new store, depending on <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags" /> flag settings.
trans-unit.target: 根据 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags" /> 标志设置，打开 X.509 证书存储或创建一个新存储。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to open an existing X.509 store.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法以打开一个现有 X.509 存储区。

trans-unit.source: Note that you must have additional permissions, specified by <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags>, to enumerate the certificates in the store.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，你必须具有由指定的其他权限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags>，枚举存储区中的证书。

trans-unit.source: You can create a new store by passing a store name that does not exist to the class constructor, and then using any of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags> flags except <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过将不存在的存储名称传递给类构造函数，，然后使用任一创建新存储<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags>标志除<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: The store is unreadable.
trans-unit.target: 此存储不可读。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: The store contains invalid values.
trans-unit.target: 此存储包含无效值。

trans-unit.source: for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开 X.509 证书存储区。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.CreateStore" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.CreateStore" />

trans-unit.source: The certificate to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的证书。

trans-unit.source: Removes a certificate from an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 从 X.509 证书存储移除证书。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove a single certificate from an X.509 store.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于从 X.509 存储区中删除一个证书。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: for removing certificates from an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于从 X.509 证书中删除证书存储区。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.RemoveFromStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.RemoveFromStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: A range of certificates to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的一系列证书。

trans-unit.source: Removes a range of certificates from an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 从 X.509 证书存储移除一系列证书。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。

trans-unit.source: This method removes more than one certificate from an X.509 certificate store; if one certificate removal fails, the operation is reverted and no certificates are removed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从 X.509 证书存储区; 中删除多个证书如果一个证书删除失败，此操作将恢复并不删除任何证书。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificates" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: for removing certificates from an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 用于从 X.509 证书中删除证书存储区。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.RemoveFromStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.RemoveFromStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> handle to an <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> store.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> 存储区的 <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> 句柄。

trans-unit.source: A handle to an <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> store.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> 存储区的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.StoreHandle%2A> property to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.StoreHandle%2A>属性来提供非托管与 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `HCERTSTORE` handle, see the unmanaged CAPI documentation in the Platform SDK section of the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`HCERTSTORE`处理，请参阅的平台 SDK 部分中的非托管的 CAPI 文档[MSDN 库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。

trans-unit.source: The store is not open.
trans-unit.target: 存储未打开。

trans-unit.source: for unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 对于非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
